The Reopening of Battle Creek College, 
                      and the Fault of Large Institutions. 


                                        St. Helena, Cal., August 3, 1903. 

Brethren Daniells, Prescott, and W. C. White:-- 
     . . . I am very sorry to hear that there is a plan to reopen Battle Creek College. To establish a college in Battle Creek, after such plain warnings have been given against doing this, would be to make a great mistake.
